name: list_clusters
description: List all available Amazon Redshift clusters and serverless workgroups in your AWS account, including their current status, connection details, and configuration.

name: list_databases
description: List all databases in a specified Amazon Redshift cluster. Discovers all databases that the user has access to, including local databases and databases created from datashares.

cluster_identifier.description: The cluster identifier to query for databases. Must be a valid cluster identifier from the list_clusters tool.

database_name.description: The database to connect to for querying system views. Defaults to 'dev'.

name: list_schemas
description: List all schemas in a specified database within a Redshift cluster. Discovers all schemas including local, external, and shared schemas from datashares.

cluster_identifier.description: The cluster identifier to query for schemas. Must be a valid cluster identifier from the list_clusters tool.

schema_database_name.description: The database name to list schemas for. Must be a valid database name from the list_databases tool.

name: list_tables
description: List all tables in a specified schema within a Redshift database. Discovers all tables including base tables, views, external tables, and shared tables.

cluster_identifier.description: The cluster identifier to query for tables. Must be a valid cluster identifier from the list_clusters tool.

table_database_name.description: The database name to list tables for. Must be a valid database name from the list_databases tool.

table_schema_name.description: The schema name to list tables for. Must be a valid schema name from the list_schemas tool.

name: list_columns
description: List all columns in a specified table within a Redshift schema. Provides detailed information about data types, constraints, and column properties.

cluster_identifier.description: The cluster identifier to query for columns. Must be a valid cluster identifier from the list_clusters tool.

column_database_name.description: The database name to list columns for. Must be a valid database name from the list_databases tool.

column_schema_name.description: The schema name to list columns for. Must be a valid schema name from the list_schemas tool.

column_table_name.description: The table name to list columns for. Must be a valid table name from the list_tables tool.

name: execute_query
description: Execute a SQL query against a Redshift cluster or serverless workgroup using the Redshift Data API. Supports various data types and returns structured results.

cluster_identifier.description: The cluster identifier to execute the query on. Must be a valid cluster identifier from the list_clusters tool.

database_name.description: The database name to execute the query against. Must be a valid database name from the list_databases tool.

sql.description: The SQL statement to execute. Should be a single SQL statement.
